settings.question_1: Who is Alpine International and where are you located?
settings.answer_1: Alpine International is a Mississauga based watch band and fashion jewelry supplier. We been in this business for the last 15 years and have become a household name in Canada and US.
settings.question_2: I want to order a particular product; how can I find it?
settings.answer_2: All our products are displayed on our website. If you have a special order request, please contact us for a quotation.
settings.question_3: What currencies do you accept for payment?
settings.answer_3: We accept payment in Canadian as well as in US dollars.
settings.answer_4: Our delivery time is between 1 to 2 business days.
settings.question_5: How do you ship your orders?
settings.answer_5: All our Canadian orders are shipped by UPS or Purolator courier service.

settings.title: Technical + Theme Questions
settings.question_1: Q: “I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?”
settings.answer_1: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select image and text that relates to your style and story.
